it.polimi.wifidirect.model

Class P2PGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.wifidirect.model.P2PGroup

  • public class P2PGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a P2PGroup with inside a android.net.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pDevice and other parameters like, persistent, the go's P2PDevice, the go's ip address, and the entire list of clients, if this device is a GO. It's an abstraction of a android.net.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pGroup.

    Created by Stefano Cappa on 31/01/15.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      P2PGroup(boolean persistent)
      Constructor with the possibility to set if this group will be a persistent group or not.
